name: unDraw
title: undraw.co
shortDescription: unDraw offers a vast collection of open-source illustrations that can be customized to match any brand identity. Ideal for designers, developers, and content creators, unDraw provides an easy-to-use platform where users can select, customize, and download illustrations for various projects. Whether you're enhancing a website, creating marketing materials, or developing educational content, unDraw's seamless integration and customization features make it a valuable resource.
pros: Free to use under open-source license
No account required for downloading images

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Flaticon
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers a wide range of icons and stickers
